title: Abandoned Cyber-Zoo Adventure #59
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Entrance Plaza
rooms.description: The main entrance of an abandoned cyber-zoo. Holographic signs flicker weakly, advertising extinct animals. Broken turnstiles block the path forward. Vines have grown through cracks in the synthetic floor. A dusty information kiosk stands near the entrance, and a security booth sits empty to one side.

items.name: information kiosk
items.description: A touch-screen kiosk covered in dust and cobwebs
items.text: WELCOME TO CYBERZOO PRIME! Featured exhibits: Arctic Habitat (opened 2087), Savanna Dome (Director Chen's favorite), Aquatic Pavilion. Remember: Director Chen oversees all operations. Security Chief Rodriguez manages access codes.

items.name: abandoned security booth
items.description: A small booth with a desk and filing system

items.name: security memorandum
items.description: A faded document with security protocols
items.text: SECURITY MEMO: Access card stored in bottom compartment. Combination is the year our first exhibit opened. All staff must remember: robotic animals are stored in the maintenance bay when not active.

items.name: security access card
items.description: A plastic card with a magnetic strip labeled 'STAFF ACCESS'

items.name: overturned trash receptacle
items.description: A toppled waste bin with scattered contents

items.name: torn visitor brochure
items.description: A damaged brochure with zoo information
items.text: Visit our amazing exhibits! See robotic tigers in the Savanna Dome! Director Chen personally designed the control systems. Exit through the main gate after your visit!

items.name: main security gate
items.description: A reinforced gate with a card reader and warning signs

rooms.name: Habitat Dome
rooms.description: A massive dome that once housed robotic animals in simulated environments. The artificial sky above flickers between day and night. Deactivated robotic animals stand frozen in various poses. Control panels line the walls, and a large observation deck overlooks the space. To the east, a heavy door leads to the control center.

items.name: habitat control panel
items.description: A dusty control panel with various displays and readouts
items.text: HABITAT CONTROL SYSTEM v3.2 - Last operator: Director Chen. System shutdown initiated by Security Chief Rodriguez. Emergency override available at main control center.

items.name: observation deck terminal
items.description: A terminal with logs and records
items.text: OBSERVATION LOG: Final entry before evacuation. All robotic specimens deactivated and stored in maintenance bay. Director Chen authorized final shutdown. Security Chief Rodriguez sealed all exits. Only authorized personnel can access control center.

items.name: equipment storage locker
items.description: A tall locker with maintenance equipment

items.name: maintenance tablet
items.description: A digital tablet with technical information
items.text: MAINTENANCE NOTES: Control center access requires security verification. Questions programmed by Security Chief Rodriguez: Who runs this facility? Where are the robots stored? What is the main exit called?

items.name: deactivated robotic tiger
items.description: A lifelike mechanical tiger frozen mid-stride

items.name: charged power cell
items.description: A glowing energy cell that could power electronic systems

items.name: reinforced control center door
items.description: A heavy security door with a biometric scanner and question panel. The panel displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Who runs this facility?
password_questions.hint: Check the information kiosk and control panels for the director's name

password_questions.question: Where are the robots stored?
password_questions.hint: The security memo and observation log mention where inactive robots are kept

password_questions.question: What is the main exit called?
password_questions.hint: The torn brochure mentions how visitors leave the facility

rooms.name: Control Center
rooms.description: You've reached the heart of the cyber-zoo! A room filled with monitors, control stations, and blinking lights. The main console shows a map of the entire facility with an emergency exit highlighted. Through a large window, you can see the path to freedom. A final door marked 'EMERGENCY EXIT' glows green, ready to open.

items.name: main control console
items.description: The central command station for the entire facility, now displaying emergency protocols

items.name: holographic facility map
items.description: A 3D map showing all areas of the cyber-zoo and the emergency exit route
items.text: EMERGENCY EVACUATION ROUTE: Proceed through emergency exit to reach the outside world. All systems nominal for evacuation.

items.name: emergency exit door
items.description: A clearly marked exit door with green lighting, leading to freedom

rooms.name: Outside the CyberZoo
rooms.description: You step out into the fresh air and sunlight. The abandoned cyber-zoo facility looms behind you, now just a memory. Overgrown paths lead away from the complex toward civilization. You are free!

items.name: path to civilization
items.description: A winding path leading away from the abandoned facility

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've navigated the abandoned cyber-zoo, solved its puzzles, and found your way to freedom! The mysteries of the derelict facility are behind you now. You win!
